title: Can't open Microsoft Teams - blank screen
body:
**Describe the bug**
Trying to open Microsoft Teams leaves a blank page.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Open Microsoft Teams
2. That's it, a blank page should be shown (the error)

**Expected behavior**
Load normally

**Screenshots**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7959437/61073245-9769c480-a3da-11e9-8cbf-79542f19a01d.png)

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: Ubuntu 18.04.2
 - Installation package deb
 - Version teams-for-linux_0.4.0_amd64.deb

**Additional context**
Clicking on debug option I get this:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7959437/61073379-e6175e80-a3da-11e9-8c81-d7850813f6af.png)

Any idea of what's going on? Thanks.
